title: I need help involving support tickets
body: I wanted to submit a support ticket but i need to sign back in to my account or something and it doesnt let me submit a ticket unless i do. The problem is I don't remember the password to the email i used a long time ago. What do i do?

replies.body:
If you're trying to recover your account or access it, use [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) when submitting a support ticket. It won't ask you to sign in and your entire correspondence will be via email.

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
